com.pb.sawdust.util

Class Detokenizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pb.sawdust.util.Detokenizer

  • public class Detokenizer
extends java.lang.Object
    The Detokenizer class provides very simple detokenizing (find key -> replace with value) operations on strings and files. It includes a main method which allows it to detokenize a file from a command line call.
